thread.title: Mandy Moore on This Is Us' Toby Reveal: Prepare for a 'Gut-Wrenching' Episode
thread.title_full: Mandy Moore on This Is Us' Toby Reveal: Prepare for a 'Gut-Wrenching' Episode

title: Mandy Moore on This Is Us' Toby Reveal: Prepare for a 'Gut-Wrenching' Episode
text:
Mandy Moore on This Is Us' Toby Reveal: Prepare for a 'Gut-Wrenching' Episode January 9, 2017 @ 4:40 PM By Ryan Gajewski 
Pray for Toby! As This Is Us fans wait breathlessly for the show's Tuesday, January 10, return to learn whether Kate's on-off boyfriend Toby ( Chris Sullivan ) pulls through after going into cardiac arrest, series star Mandy Moore (Rebecca) tells Us Weekly that the episode takes an emotional toll. PHOTOS: 10 Most Devastating TV Deaths of 2016 
Moore participated in a Television Critics Association press event on the Universal Studios lot on Friday, January 6, where she was asked to comment on the NBC drama's cliffhanger from the winter finale , which featured Toby flatlining on Christmas Eve and getting rushed to the hospital. Mandy Moore arrives at the 74th Annual Golden Globe Awards in 2017. Christopher Polk/NBC/NBCU Photo Bank via Getty Images 
"This show is always gut-wrenching," the actress, 32, tells Us. "Every episode, there’s going to be something gut-wrenching. They really know what they're doing! I can’t [say more] … You’ve waited this long." Chris Sullivan as Toby on 'This Is Us.' Ron Batzdorff/NBC/NBCU Photo Bank via Getty Images PHOTOS: Huge TV Shows That Were Quickly Canceled and Forgotten 
On a happier note, Moore gushes about her chemistry with Milo Ventimiglia , who plays Rebecca's late husband, Jack. "We just love each other, and it’s so easy to work with each other," she says about the Gilmore Girls alum. "At this point, 15 episodes in, we have our own language. We challenge each other — we’re comfortable with each other." Mandy Moore and Milo Ventimiglia at the 74th Annual Golden Globe Awards in 2017. Kevork Djansezian/NBC/NBCU Photo Bank via Getty Images 
The License to Wed star adds, "We really lucked out and enjoy each other, and the chemistry was sort of there from the get-go." You May Also Like
